Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ankhefen-Bastet with black detail: a short wig tied with a fillet, a modelled face and hands held apart holding a hoe and the string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of Hieroglyphic text; the feet are lost(?).
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Walter Llewellyn Nash (Executors of)
